product_name: Canari Core Bike Shorts - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Prefer to ride in a softer, more breathable pair of shorts? Try the women's mostly-cotton-yet still form-fitting-Core Bike Shorts from Canari and enjoy the change. Shorts are 92% cotton for breathability and 8% spandex for stretch and compression in a classic 6-panel design. UPF 30 sun protection. Arrivo women-specific seamless chamois adds comfort in the saddle. Canari Core Bike Shorts for women have soft-touch leg grippers and an 8 in. inseam. Closeout.
short_description: Prefer to ride in a softer, more breathable pair of shorts? Try the women's mostly-cotton-yet still form-fitting-Core Bike Shorts from Canari and enjoy the change.
